label: Dismissal of contractor personnel during site closure
quote: on-site contractor personnel shall also be dismissed if the site is being closed.

label: Provision of sufficient personnel for critical efforts during site closure
quote: the Contractor shall continue to provide sufficient personnel to perform around-the-clock requirements of critical efforts already in progress or scheduled and shall be guided by the instructions issued by the Contracting Officer or her/his duly appointed representative.

label: Contractor staff actions during site closure per company policy
quote: the Contractor will direct its staff as necessary to take actions such as reporting to its own site(s) or taking appropriate leave consistent with its policies.

label: Contractor employees must identify themselves as company employees
quote: The Contractor will ensure that its employees will identify themselves as employees of their respective company while working on U.S. Customs & Border Protection (CBP) contracts.

label: Contractor personnel must use specified email signature format
quote: The contractor will ensure that their personnel use the following format signature on all official e-mails generated by CBP computers:
